trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of input that the grammar, defined by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>, will match.
trans-unit.target: Indica il tipo di input, la grammatica definita dal <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>, corrisponderanno.

trans-unit.source: The input mode for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> is determined by its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La modalità di input per un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>è determinato dal relativo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The default input mode is Voice, which indicates that the grammar defined by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> will match speech input.
trans-unit.target: La modalità di input predefinita è vocali, che indica che la grammatica definito tramite il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>corrisponderà input vocale.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The Dtmf mode indicates that a grammar will match Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency (DTMF) tones instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: La modalità Dtmf indica che una grammatica verrà corrisponde toni DTMF Dual tono Multi-Frequency (DTMF) invece di riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: There are 16 DTMF tones, 12 of which are commonly found on most telephones.
trans-unit.target: Esistono 16 toni DTMF, 12 di cui vengono in genere individuati nella maggior parte dei telefoni.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object will match the type of input specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property, which gets an instance of SrgsGrammarMode.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>dell'oggetto da un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetto corrisponderà al tipo di input specificato dal <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>proprietà, che ottiene un'istanza di SrgsGrammarMode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object will match DTMF tones similar to those found on a telephone, instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> oggetto corrisponderà toni DTMF simili a quelle disponibili in un telefono, invece di riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object will match speech input.
